actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to prohibit public utilities from increasing any rate or charge for electric energy, by means of any fuel adjustment clause in a wholesale rate schedule, in order to reflect more than 50 percent of any increased fuel cost.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Power Act, that no public utility may increase any rate or charge for electric energy in order to reflect any increased fuel cost if such rate is calculated under a fuel adjustment clause in a wholesale rate schedule and if such clause allows more than 50 percent of the increased fuel cost to be reflected in the increased rate or charge. (Amends 16 U.S.C. 824d(d))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Power Act to prohibit public utilities from increasing any rate or charge for electric energy, by means of any fuel adjustment clause in a wholesale rate schedule, in order to reflect more than 50 percent of any increased fuel cost.
